Package com.watr.app.ui.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonStateToggler
    Utility class to easily enable and disable buttons in a user-friendly way by additionally altering their opacity in addition to altering their behaviour.
    HydrationRecordListAdapter
    Hydration record recycler view adapter.
    HydrationRecordListAdapter.HydrationRecordViewHolder
    Hydration record recycler view view holder.
    ImageViewAnimator
    Image view animator with support for sequencing based off of a list of TranslateAnimations.
    NumberInputValueCoercer
    TextWatcher implementation to force EditText inputs to be within a certain numerical range or else get truncated.
    PageTracker
    Utility class to keep track of what page is currently selected in the view pager.
